result.execSummary:
The deferred prosecution or sentencing agreement(s) on this case were fulfilled, and the charge(s) were dismissed.

One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Wyatt D Grauwels is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Case is dismissed as Defn has successfully completed FOP
Proposed to Dismiss Upon Defendant's Completion of DPU/FOP
The State of Wisconsin's Motion to Dismiss Upon Defendant's Completion of DPP/FOP
Defendant accepted into FOP; contract terminates on November 3, 2022
and returned.
FOP intake appointment on May 3, 2022

Your signature bond is set in the amount of $500 per case. You may be responsible for paying this amount if you miss a court date or do not follow conditions of your release. 
- Defendant shall report to the Dane County Jail to complete the booking/fingerprinting process within 10 days of today. 
- DE shall not purchase or possess any type of firearm or dangerous weapon, except for purposes of licensed hunting only.  
DE shall not possess any type of ammunition, except for purposes of licensed hunting only. 
- Defendant shall not consume alcohol. 
- Defendant shall not use/possess controlled substances or drug paraphernalia without a valid prescription. 
Trial Judge - Br 17 

Defendant has acknowledged and agreed to terms and conditions of bond. Defendant must return signed bond form within 10 days of today. Any bail money previously posted will not be returned until a signed bond form is on file with the Clerk of Courts.

Court reporter Teri Groves. Defendant in court with Attorney Craig S. Powell.  Carl Jacob Lazarus appeared for the State of Wisconsin. DE request a modification to the bond conditions. Parties agree to modify the bond conditions to as follows: 

-DE shall not purchase or possess any type of firearm or dangerous weapon, except for purposes of licensed hunting only.  

-DE shall not possess any type of ammunition, except for purposes of licensed hunting only. 

ALL OTHER BAIL CONDITIONS WILL REMAIN THE SAME.

Court reporter Teri Groves. Defendant in court with Attorney Craig S. Powell.  Carl Jacob Lazarus appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Plea Questionnaire & Waiver of Rights Signed. Def entered a plea of guilty to count 3.  Court accepted defendant's plea, found and adjudged defendant guilty. Court withholds adjudication and refers the DE to DPU. 

AMENDMENTS: 

On Motion of the State, the Court DISM Count #1 and 2.

Bail continued.

Court reporter Teri Groves. Defendant in court with Attorney Craig S. Powell.  Carl Jacob Lazarus appeared for the State of Wisconsin. In court today for a motion hearing as requested by the defense. State advises that they are going to dismiss counts 1 and 2 and a DPU plea for count 3.

11:02 AM Defendant in court with Attorney Craig S. Powell.  Andrea Beth Raymond appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  All parties by Zoom. The defendant received a copy of the Complaint and waived reading. Defense moved to dismiss Count 1, made argument. Objection and argument by State. Court denied motion. Court entered Not Guilty pleas as to any misdemeanor counts.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for April 15, 2022 at 02:45 pm.
